name: Major Hewex
Lore: 'Leader of Navy detachment assigned to guard the Endor control bunker. Liaison between Imperial technicians and command staff.',
Text: 'Adds 1 to total power for each of your troopers present at same site. When on Endor, subtracts 1 from total for Deactivate The Shield Generator and your troopers are forfeit +1 on Endor. When at Bunker, allows Imperials to deploy there as a ''react''.',
